Text.Page:
We're starting to get a handle on things for the first time in months. So now it's time to strike back against the cultists.

Why are you still here? You're the closest person, so you win the draw. I have a written order here assinging you to {@LinkCreature:218#1009#Chenast}. Head toward Arena of the Exalted report for duty. Go, go!

Anaka sent you, did she? Hmm.

All right, then. Let's put you to work. It seems the {@LinkCreature:18#19#Lokian vanguards} and {@LinkCreature:18#23#Lokian magisters} are hatching some ritual or other.

Stop them before they succeed.

Those are...heads! Wow. That's what you brought me, all right.

Well, good! Anaka will be thrilled. She loves to decorate with pieces of cultists. Thinks it intimidates them. Might be right.

Anyway, pile them over there. Thanks for that.
If you wait much longer, they'll complete their creepy ritual for sure. It's the {@LinkCreature:18#21#Lokian berserkers} and the {@LinkCreature:18#22#Lokian priests} that need your...assistance.
